mapper.sql: id, member_id, ord_openid, biz_no, biz_name, prod_no,prod_name, gprs_no, ordno,dev_type, channel, total_time, per_price, prod_qt, prod_price, wallet,coins, give_qt, pulse, pay_way, succ, transfers_is, transfers_state, state,otp_code, crtime, uptime
mapper.update:
update ord
member_id= #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR },
ord_openid= #{ordOpenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR },
biz_no= #{bizNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR },
biz_name= #{bizName,jdbcType=VARCHAR },
prod_no= #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR },
gprs_no= #{gprsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR },
ordno= #{ordno,jdbcType=VARCHAR },
channel= #{channel,jdbcType=INTEGER },
total_time= #{totalTime,jdbcType=INTEGER },
per_price= #{perPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL },
prod_qt= #{prodQt,jdbcType=INTEGER },
prod_price= #{prodPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL },
wallet= #{wallet,jdbcType=DECIMAL },
coins= #{coins,jdbcType=DECIMAL },
give_qt= #{giveQt,jdbcType=INTEGER },
pulse= #{pulse,jdbcType=INTEGER },
pay_way= #{payWay,jdbcType=INTEGER },
succ= #{succ,jdbcType=INTEGER },
transfers_is= #{transfersIs,jdbcType=INTEGER },
transfers_state= #{transfersState,jdbcType=INTEGER },
state= #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER },
otp_code= #{otpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR },
crtime= #{crtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP },
uptime= #{uptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP },
where id =#{id}
update ord set state = #{state} ,uptime = now() where ordno =#{ordno}
update ord set transfers_state = 1 ,uptime = now() where transfers_is=1 AND transfers_state=0 AND TO_DAYS(ord.CRTIME) < TO_DAYS(NOW())
mapper.select: select * from ord where id =#{id}
select sum(prod_price) as prod_price from ord where biz_no = #{bizNo} and TO_DAYS(crtime) = TO_DAYS(now())and pay_way = 2 and state =2 group by biz_no
select sum(wallet) as wallet from ord where biz_no = #{bizNo} and TO_DAYS(crtime) = TO_DAYS(now())and pay_way = 3 and state =2 group by biz_no
select sum(coins) as coins from ord where biz_no = #{bizNo} and TO_DAYS(crtime) = TO_DAYS(now())and pay_way = 3 and state =2 group by biz_no
select sum(prod_price) as prod_price from ord where prod_no = #{prodNo} and TO_DAYS(crtime) = TO_DAYS(now()) and state =2 group by prod_no
select sum(prod_price) as prod_price from ord where prod_no = #{prodNo} and pay_way = #{payWay} and TO_DAYS(crtime) = TO_DAYS(now()) and state =2 group by prod_no
select sum(prod_price) as prod_price from ord where biz_no = #{bizNo} and TO_DAYS(crtime) >= TO_DAYS(#{mondayOfWeek}) and pay_way = 2 and state =2 group by biz_no
select sum(wallet) as wallet from ord where biz_no = #{bizNo} and TO_DAYS(crtime) >= TO_DAYS(#{mondayOfWeek}) and pay_way = 3 and state =2 group by biz_no
select sum(coins) as coins from ord where biz_no = #{bizNo} and TO_DAYS(crtime) >= TO_DAYS(#{mondayOfWeek}) and pay_way = 3 and state =2 group by biz_no
select sum(prod_price) as prod_price from ord where prod_no = #{prodNo} and TO_DAYS(crtime) >= TO_DAYS(#{mondayOfWeek}) and state =2 group by prod_no
select sum(prod_price) as prod_price from ord where prod_no = #{prodNo} and pay_way=#{payWay} and TO_DAYS(crtime) >= TO_DAYS(#{mondayOfWeek}) and state =2 group by prod_no

SELECT sum( case pay_way when 1 then prod_price else 0.00 end ) AS aliInc, sum( case pay_way when 2 then prod_price else 0.00 end ) AS wxInc, sum( case pay_way when 3 then prod_price else 0.00 end ) AS wltInc FROM ord WHERE prod_no = #{prodNo} and TO_DAYS(crtime) = TO_DAYS(now()) AND state = 2

SELECT sum( case pay_way when 1 then prod_price else 0.00 end ) AS aliInc, sum( case pay_way when 2 then prod_price else 0.00 end ) AS wxInc, sum( case pay_way when 3 then prod_price else 0.00 end ) AS wltInc FROM ord WHERE ord.prod_no = #{prodNo} AND TO_DAYS(ord.crtime) >= TO_DAYS(#{mondayOfWeek}) AND ord.state = 2

SELECT sum( case pay_way when 1 then prod_price else 0.00 end ) AS aliInc, sum( case pay_way when 2 then prod_price else 0.00 end ) AS wxInc, sum( case pay_way when 3 then prod_price else 0.00 end ) AS wltInc FROM ord WHERE ord.prod_no = #{prodNo} AND TO_DAYS(ord.crtime) >= TO_DAYS(#{mondayOfWeek}) AND ord.state = 2

SELECT sum( case pay_way when 1 then prod_price else 0.00 end ) AS aliInc, sum( case pay_way when 2 then prod_price else 0.00 end ) AS wxInc, sum( case pay_way when 3 then prod_price else 0.00 end ) AS wltInc FROM ord WHERE prod_no = #{prodNo} and DATE_FORMAT(crtime, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m') AND state = 2

SELECT sum( case pay_way when 1 then prod_price else 0.00 end ) AS aliInc, sum( case pay_way when 2 then prod_price else 0.00 end ) AS wxInc, sum( case pay_way when 3 then prod_price else 0.00 end ) AS wltInc FROM ord WHERE prod_no = #{prodNo} and DATE_FORMAT(crtime, '%Y%m%d') >= #{beginDate} and DATE_FORMAT(crtime, '%Y%m%d') <= #{endDate} AND state = 2

SELECT sum( case pay_way when 1 then prod_price else 0.00 end ) AS aliInc, sum( case pay_way when 2 then prod_price else 0.00 end ) AS wxInc, sum( case pay_way when 3 then prod_price else 0.00 end ) AS wltInc FROM ord WHERE prod_no = #{prodNo} AND state = 2

SELECT sum( case pay_way when 1 then prod_price else 0.00 end ) AS aliInc, sum( case pay_way when 2 then prod_price else 0.00 end ) AS wxInc, sum( case pay_way when 3 then prod_price else 0.00 end ) AS wltInc FROM ord where prod_no = #{prodNo} and state =2
select sum(prod_price) as prod_price from ord where biz_no = #{bizNo} and DATE_FORMAT(crtime, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m') and pay_way = 2 and state =2 group by biz_no
select sum(wallet) as wallet from ord where biz_no = #{bizNo} and DATE_FORMAT(crtime, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m') and pay_way = 3 and state =2 group by biz_no
select sum(coins) as coins from ord where biz_no = #{bizNo} and DATE_FORMAT(crtime, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m') and pay_way = 3 and state =2 group by biz_no
select sum(prod_price) as prod_price from ord where prod_no = #{prodNo} group by prod_no
select sum(prod_price) as prod_price from ord where prod_no = #{prodNo} and DATE_FORMAT(crtime, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m') and state =2 group by prod_no
select sum(prod_price) as prod_price from ord where prod_no = #{prodNo} and pay_way = #{payWay} and DATE_FORMAT(crtime, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m') and state =2 group by prod_no
select sum(prod_price) as prod_price from ord where biz_no = #{bizNo} and pay_way = 2 and state =2 group by biz_no
select sum(wallet) as wallet from ord where biz_no = #{bizNo} and pay_way = 3 and state =2 group by biz_no
select sum(coins) as coins from ord where biz_no = #{bizNo} and pay_way = 3 and state =2 group by biz_no
select sum(prod_price) as prod_price from ord where prod_no = #{prodNo} and state =2 group by prod_no
select sum(prod_price) as prod_price from ord where prod_no = #{prodNo} and pay_way=#{payWay} and state =2 group by prod_no

select sum(prod_price) as prod_price from ord where biz_no = #{bizNo} and DATE_FORMAT(crtime, '%Y%m%d') >= #{beginDate} and DATE_FORMAT(crtime, '%Y%m%d') <= #{endDate} and pay_way = 2 and state =2 group by biz_no

select sum(wallet) as wallet from ord where biz_no = #{bizNo} and DATE_FORMAT(crtime, '%Y%m%d') >= #{beginDate} and DATE_FORMAT(crtime, '%Y%m%d') <= #{endDate} and pay_way = 3 and state =2 group by biz_no

select sum(coins) as coins from ord where biz_no = #{bizNo} and DATE_FORMAT(crtime, '%Y%m%d') >= #{beginDate} and DATE_FORMAT(crtime, '%Y%m%d') <= #{endDate} and pay_way = 3 and state =2 group by biz_no
select sum(prod_price) as prod_price from ord where prod_no = #{prodNo} and DATE_FORMAT(crtime, '%Y%m%d') >= #{beginDate} and DATE_FORMAT(crtime, '%Y%m%d') <= #{endDate} and state =2 group by prod_no

select sum(prod_price) as prod_price from ord where prod_no = #{prodNo} and pay_way = #{payWay} and DATE_FORMAT(crtime, '%Y%m%d') >= #{beginDate} and DATE_FORMAT(crtime, '%Y%m%d') <= #{endDate} and state =2 group by prod_no
select * from ord where gprs_no = #{gprsNo} and state = 1 order by crtime desc limit 1
select * from ord WHERE ordno= #{ordno,jdbcType=VARCHAR }

SELECT ord.*, ord_pay_wx.resv_acct AS bizNum,ord_pay_wx.resv_biz_no as resvBizNo FROM ord LEFT JOIN ord_pay_wx ON ord.ORDNO = ord_pay_wx.PAYNO WHERE ord.pay_way = #{payWay} AND (ord.state =1 or ord.state =3) AND (ord.succ = 0 or ord.succ is null) AND NOW()> DATE_ADD(ord.crtime,INTERVAL 10 MINUTE) ORDER BY CRTIME ASC

SELECT ord.BIZ_NO AS bizNo , ord_pay_wx.RESV_BIZ_NO AS resvBizNo , ord_pay_wx.RESV_ACCT AS bizNum , biz_take_wx.OPENID AS openid , biz_take_wx.NICK AS nick , SUM(ord.PROD_PRICE) AS money FROM ord LEFT JOIN biz_take_wx ON ord.BIZ_NO = biz_take_wx.BIZ_NO LEFT JOIN ord_pay_wx ON ord.ORDNO = ord_pay_wx.PAYNO WHERE ord.TRANSFERS_IS = 1 AND ord.TRANSFERS_STATE = 1 AND ord.PAY_WAY = 2 AND ord.succ=1 GROUP BY ord.BIZ_NO , ord_pay_wx.RESV_ACCT
select count(1) from ord
select count(1) from ord LEFT JOIN ord_pay_wx ON ord.ordno=ord_pay_wx.payno
select sum(prod_price) from ord
select sum(prod_price) from ord
select prod_no as prodNo, gprs_no as gprsNo, ordno as ordNo, prod_price as Moeny, pulse as pulse, succ, state, crtime, uptime from ord WHERE biz_no= #{bizNo} and TO_DAYS(crtime) = TO_DAYS(now())
select count(1) from ord
